## IsObject type

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export type IsObject<T> = IfExtends<
  [T, never],
  false,
  IfExtends<[T, object], IfExtends<[IsAny<T>, true], false, true>, false>
>
```
<b>References:</b> [IfExtends](./types-kit.ifextends.md)<!-- -->, [IsAny](./types-kit.isany.md)

## Example


```ts
// Expect: true
type Foo = IsObject<{ foo: 'foo' }>
```
